Class Relation

java.lang.Object
bec.scode.Relation
public class Relation extends Object

Relation.

relation ::= ?lt | ?le | ?eq | ?ge | ?gt | ?ne

Link to GitHub: Source File.

    • compare

      public static boolean compare(int LHS, int relation, int RHS)
      Compare two integer values according to the given relation.
      Parameters:
      LHS - the left hand value
      relation - one of: LT, LE, EQ, GE, GT, NE
      RHS - the right hand value
      Returns:
      true if the relation holds
